org.apache.giraph.comm

接口 WorkerServer<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex value
    E - Edge value
    M - Message data
    所有超级接口:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    所有已知实现类:
    NettyWorkerServer

    public interface WorkerServer<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Closeable
    Interface for message communication server.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      Shuts down.
      InetSocketAddress getMyAddress()
      Get server address
      ServerData<I,V,E,M> getServerData()
      Get server data
      void prepareSuperstep(GraphState<I,V,E,M> graphState)
      Prepare incoming messages for computation, and resolve mutation requests.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getMyAddress

        InetSocketAddress getMyAddress()
        Get server address
        返回:
        Address used by this server

      • prepareSuperstep

        void prepareSuperstep(GraphState<I,V,E,M> graphState)
        Prepare incoming messages for computation, and resolve mutation requests.
        参数:
        graphState - Current graph state

      • getServerData

        ServerData<I,V,E,M> getServerData()
        Get server data
        返回:
        Server data

      • close

        void close()
        Shuts down.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 AutoCloseable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 Closeable
